title: Last Night on the Titanic: The Writers
description: The sinking of the Titanic is memorable for its countless stories, and the reason that so many of them have found their way down to us today was the many writers that were onboard the ship. The first draft of history about the Titanic was written by man prominent writers. We will focus on six in this episode: Paul Danby, Adolphe Saalfeld, Edith Rosenbaum Russell, William Stead,  Jacques Futrelle, and Lawrence Beesley
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
